lead_paragraph: LEWIN--Estelle Weinberg. Born April 19, 1920, died January 19, 2016, three months short of her 96th birthday. Daughter of Benjamin and Mary Weinberg, Estelle was part of a loving family. She was predeceased by both her parents and her only brother, Michael Wayne. In 1941, she met the love of her life, Harry Lewin. They married on March 21, 1942 and lived together in wedded bliss. They were married for more than 64 years when Harry died in June 2006. Together they had two daughters, Linda Taub and Blylee Gardiner Bernstein. Linda's husband David passed away in November 2012. Estelle is survived by her daughters Linda and Blylee and Blylee's husband David Bernstein; three grandsons and their wives, Andrew and Suzanne Taub, Marc and Sandy Taub and Joshua and Lisa Taub. She had six great-grandchildren, Jake, Trevor, Chloe, Camille, Asher and Matthew. Funeral services will be held on Friday, January 22, 2016 at 12:00 noon. They will be conducted at Gutterman's Memorial Chapel, Jericho Turnpike in Woodbury, NY. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  LEWIN, ESTELLE WEINBERG
